 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַרְעַפָּה‎</span> **noun feminine** ==bough== (with infixed <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>; compare [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:85w»§ 85w</sup>, as transition-consonant [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1, 472</sup>; compare Biblical Aramaic, [[BDB#Kau|Kau]]<sup>§ 62 F.</sup> Selle<sup>De Aramaismis Lib. Ezech. 17</sup>); **\*\***compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***branches***, [[Ezek.31.5|Ezek 31:5]] and elsewhere (PS<sup>3956</sup>), from √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***propagavit, germinavit***. — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סַרְעַפֹּתָיו‎</span> [[Ezek.31.5|Ezek 31:5]] (of Pharaoh under figure of tree, compare [[BDB#Co|Co]] [[BDB#Berthol|Berthol]] Toy).
